root.name: Entity
root.description: OverviewA woman finds a strange artifact, and ends up transported to a fantastical, prehistoric world. Gaining the ability to shoot energy bolts, but losing most of her clothes, she has to fight her way through several environments and collect pieces of the artifact along the way.LevelsThe game has five levels, and each end with a boss fight.The PrehistoryThe MountainThe ForestThe CaveThe Apocalypse
